LONG DESCRIPTION: syntactic sugar for a string which is actually a list of numbers
map a function over a list or zip 2 lists and perform a dyadic operation on each pair
raise one number of the power of another, vectorising
catanate a number or a list to a list
repeat a value in a list a number of times

build a square matrix with 1s at locations specified
split a complex number into its constituents
